document_data.mainbody:
at Alley was an alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Cat Alley was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. The alley originated on the Street of Bells where it branched west to pass through a small neighborhood east of the High Road. A smaller alley called the Cats Tail branched off the south end of Cat Alley.
* Olmhazans Jewels
